name: adjust
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: adjust
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to change something slightly, especially to make it more correct, effective, or suitable
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指为了使某物更正确、有效或合适而）调整；调节

example.eg: If the chair is too high you can adjust it to suit you.
example.egtrans: 如果椅子太高了，你可以把它调到适合你的高度。

example.eg: As a teacher you have to adjust your methods to suit the needs of slower children.
example.egtrans: 作为一名老师，你必须调整教学方法来适应那些学得较慢的孩子的需要。

trans_examp.trans_en: to arrange your clothing to make yourself look tidy

example.eg: She adjusted her skirt, took a deep breath, and walked into the room.
example.egtrans: 她整了整裙子，深吸一口气，走进了房间。

dsense.name: adjust
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to become more familiar with a new situation

example.eg: I can't adjust to living on my own.
Her eyes slowly adjusted to the dark.
example.egtrans: 她的眼睛慢慢适应了黑暗。

example.eg: The lifestyle is so very different - it takes a while to adjust.
example.egtrans: 生活方式差别太大了，得过一段时间才能适应。
